abilities.desc: When you gain Speed tokens, replace half of them (rounded down) with Power tokens.
You can Enhance a Hit two additional times.

actions.name: Yell
actions.desc: You gain Power tokens equal to half of X (rounded up), then you gain a Shield with a value equal to half of X (rounded down)

actions.name: Crush
actions.desc:
Unblockable by Abilities and Tokens.
Deal 3 damage to an enemy within range.
9+: Deal 5 damage instead, and Crush is Unblockable.

skill.name: Unstoppable
skill.desc: You can smash through any door, wall or vehicle.
